inicio.txt_2: Currently, I am looking for a company that allows me to grow as a developer and collaborate on challenging projects.

description.line_1: I am a professional dedicated to the excellence of my projects, recommending technologies and strategies for each case.
description.line_2: Staying ahead is one of my top priorities.

item_1.txt_2: Make web layouts based on results from graphic designers, implementing professional design tools such as Photoshop, Illustrator and Lightroom.

item_2.txt_2: Personalized solutions for more complex and specific needs.

item_3.txt_2: I carry out database implementations together with the development of applications on platforms such as MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server and MongoDB.

p_1.data: App YouTube, make this application only as a replica of the official application without any intention of violating their privacy policies. Application Status (Trial Period) Application 15% complete, from time to time I continue to work on it and plan to complete it 100%.
p_1.tecnologias: Technologies used React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3.

p_2.data: Web app called Comidas lo mejor focused on the online sale of food dishes.
p_2.tecnologias: Technologies used React, Framework Next.js, JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5.

p_3.data: Web app where you can manage images in the Pinterest style.
p_3.tecnologias: Technologies used JavaScript, Express.js Framework, MongoDB, EJS Template Engine, Bootstrap Framework, CSS3, HTML5.

p_4.data: User administration web app, with security to avoid attacks like XSS, CSRF, SQL INJECTION, CODE INJECTION, BRUTE FORCE ROBOTS also includes SSL and .htaccess file.
p_4.tecnologias: Technologies used PHP PDO implementation, Bootstrap Framework, HTML5, CSS3, DB MySql, DB deploy with Clever cloud.

p_5.data: Web app, shoe factory with production lines and production orders with model and color, these are supervised by 2 operators, who carry out the quality control of the shoes.
p_5.tecnologias: Technologies used JavaScript, TypeScript, Express.js Framework, Mysql, CSS3, HTML5, Tailwind Framework, HandleBards template engine, Testing with jest.

p_6.data: Desktop app, GUI that has a lexical and syntactic analyzer and a section where we can enter sql queries, after executing the system it will return the analysis of the lexical and syntactic analyzer with a message validating our query.
p_6.tecnologias: Technologies used Java, IDE NetBeans, Libraries java-cup.jar, java-cup-11a.jar, Jflex.jar.

p_7.data: App desktop, consists of the administration of a company that has Employees, Users, Offices, Products, Orders, Payments, Customers, Product Line, Order Details.
p_7.tecnologias: Technologies used Java, IDE NetBeans 8.2, MySql, Libraries mysql-connector-java-8.0.21.jar, jcalendar-1.3.2.jar, swingx-1.6.2.jar, NefAnimation_V2.1_jdk17.jar.

p_8.data: App, consists of a game where we have 7 leds, when starting the leds they start in blue when they reach the end of the led strip, wait 1 sec for the player to press the button to continue, if the time has elapsed without pressing the button, the game shows us a red led and starts the game again.

p_9.data: It consists of two Applications that perform a lexical analysis in 2 different ways, one is using arrays and the other is using logical code.

p_10.data: App desktop, consists of the administration of a book publisher, which also implements the validation and use of ISBNS.

data.txt_1: I have been working as a freelance web developer for 4 years, applying to projects.
data.txt_2: I have had the opportunity to work for private companies and public entities.
data.txt_3: Currently, I am looking for a job that will enrich me as a professional, where I can collaborate on large projects with experts in the field of web development.

description.txt_1: Information Systems Engineering major, Advanced student and scholarship holder, in this career I managed to fortify the foundations of programming by implementing technological solutions in real practical cases with different programming languages, various methodologies and techniques.
description.txt_2: Applied technologies: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind, C/C++, Java, Haskell, Prolog, MySql, Arduino, Git, GitHub. Linux, Node.js, npm, Unit Testing with Jest, Apache NetBeans IDE 8.1/14.0, Dev c++, Visual Stude Code editor, Jira Software, Trello.

description.txt_1: In this course I developed all the knowledge that a Full Stack Developer must have to carry out any application without problems.
description.txt_2: Applied technologies: Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Java with Spring Boot, OOP, MySql, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), Docker, Clever cloud, Hostings such as Render, Firebase, Heroku, Scrum Methodology.

description.txt_1: In this course I developed solutions in React.js, this being the currently most used JavaScript framework that allows us to develop frontend web applications (SPA, single page applications), mainly implementing: variables, jsx, views, components, states, hooks, control structures, lists and much more.
description.txt_2: Applied technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Tailwind, MongoDB, Firebase.

description.txt_1: In this course I developed solutions in Next.js using everything I learned from React.js, one of the projects I did with this React.js framework was this portfolio.
description.txt_2: Applied technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Tailwind, MongoDB, Firebase.

description.txt_1: In this project I developed JavaScript solutions strengthening the fundamentals of this programming language, mainly implementing: Syntax & Variables, Loops/Iterations, Functions, Objects, Arrays, DOM, Events, Storage & JSON, Advanced Operators, Promises/Async, AJAX and Fetch, Axios, Node.js, Scrum Methodology.
description.txt_2: Applied technologies: Express.js Framework, EJS & Handlerbars Template Engines, Cookie Implementation, OOP, Unit Testing Jest, Bootstrap, Tailwind, MySql, Hosting Railway.
